description:
It happens – you hit the beach, set up your favorite chair... and proceed to steadily sink into the sand. Beach day, ruined. Thankfully, this sturdy ground sheet attaches to your Helinox Chair One for a pleasant beachside throne experience. Not today, sand.

  • Chair legs slide into corner pockets of sheet for security
  • Securely attaches to the center of the chair for a confidence-inspiring fit
name: Helinox Ground Sheet Chair One
